name: Pier Pressure (itch) (LuckyFeathers)
description:
“Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand”

When you trip you are bound to fall at some point, the question is just when? In ‘Pier Pressure’ the goal is to delay the unavoidable fall for as long as you can by continuing building an infinite path so that embarrassing moment might never happen. Although it will of course, no matter what. Such is life.

‘Pier Pressure’ is a puzzle game where you have to build a continuous pier using different pieces that match up before your guy falls off. The longer you are able to keep the guy stumbling the higher the score you will achieve, and with the score you can buy upgrades so that future attempts will be even better.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 with the theme Delay the Inevitable

By

  • Visual & Audio Design: “Beefbone” - Markus Øvre
  • Programming & Game Design: “LuckyFeathers” - Andreas Winther Moen
